snippet: In most of the races that will decide control of the United States Senate, Democratic candidates raised more than their Republican opponents during the three months ending in June.
abstract: Campaign finance reports indicate that Democratic candidates in most races that will decide control of United States Senate raised more than their Republican opponents during three months ending June 2014, and entered the summer with bulging bank accounts; Republicans say they continue to have an edge in the Senate races they need to win.
lead_paragraph: In most of the races that will decide control of the United States Senate, Democratic candidates raised more than their Republican opponents during the three months ending in June.

headline.main: Looking to the Fall, Democrats in Senate Races Lead Fund-Raising
headline.print_headline: Looking to the Fall, Democrats in Senate Races Lead Fund-Raising
